content.prompt: Let P = price, MR = marginal revenue, MC = marginal cost, and ATC = average total cost. In monopolistic competition, which of the following most accurately describes the long-run equilibrium conditions for a firm?

choices.label: P > ATC, MR = MC, and P > MC
P > ATC, MR > MC, and P = MC
P = ATC, MR = MC, and P > MC
P = ATC, MR = MC, and P = MC
P = ATC, MR > MC, and P > MC

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
